description: Advanced policy search service with exact/partial matching, SSN/TIN search optimization, and validation business logic
acceptance_criteria: Policy search returns results within 3 seconds, supports all BRD search criteria, handles partial matches correctly
test_coverage: 15 test methods covering search, CRUD, validation, error handling

description: Claims management service with history filtering, subrogation management, and claim-level policy data handling
acceptance_criteria: Claim history displays with status filtering, claim-level policy data overrides work with audit trail
test_coverage: 8 test methods covering history, overrides, subrogation, settlement calculations

description: Payment processing service with reserve allocation, settlement management, and multiple payment methods
acceptance_criteria: Payment creation supports multiple methods, reserve allocation prevents over-allocation, settlement calculations are accurate
test_coverage: 6 test methods covering payment processing, reserve allocation, validation

description: Unified search service with PostgreSQL full-text search optimization and search vector management
acceptance_criteria: Search service returns results within performance requirements, supports exact and partial matching across all entities
test_coverage: Service reviewed - comprehensive implementation with full-text search capabilities

description: External integration coordinator with circuit breaker pattern and error handling for third-party services
acceptance_criteria: Integration service handles external API failures gracefully, implements retry logic with exponential backoff
test_coverage: Service reviewed - well-implemented circuit breaker pattern with comprehensive error handling

description: Enhanced policy API endpoints with advanced search, SSN/TIN search, and comprehensive CRUD operations
acceptance_criteria: Policy API supports all BRD search criteria, returns masked PII correctly, handles validation errors properly
test_coverage: API reviewed - proper authentication, authorization, and error handling

description: Enhanced claims API with history display, status filtering, claim-level policy data management
acceptance_criteria: Claims API returns filtered history, supports claim-level policy overrides with visual indicators, maintains audit trail
reason: Basic structure implemented, needs enhanced endpoints for claim overrides and subrogation

description: Enhanced payments API with multiple payment methods, reserve management, and settlement processing
acceptance_criteria: Payments API supports ACH/Wire/Card methods, processes settlements correctly, validates reserve allocations
reason: Basic structure exists, needs integration with payment service for full functionality

description: Stripe Connect integration service for payment processing and payout management
acceptance_criteria: Stripe integration processes payments successfully, handles webhooks correctly, maintains transaction records
test_coverage: Service reviewed - proper Stripe API integration with webhook handling

description: Frontend project setup with React, TypeScript, dependencies, and build configuration
acceptance_criteria: Frontend project builds successfully, development server starts without errors, TypeScript compilation passes
test_coverage: Configuration reviewed - comprehensive React TypeScript setup

description: TypeScript type definitions for policies, claims, payments, and API responses
acceptance_criteria: Types match backend schemas exactly, enable proper type checking, support all required fields
test_coverage: Type definitions reviewed - comprehensive coverage of all entities

description: Frontend API service layer with HTTP client, error handling, and authentication
acceptance_criteria: API service handles requests/responses correctly, includes JWT token management, provides consistent error handling
test_coverage: Service reviewed - proper HTTP client with authentication and error handling

description: Policy search page with form, results display, and advanced search criteria
acceptance_criteria: Policy search page renders correctly, submits search requests, displays results with proper PII masking
test_coverage: Component reviewed - functional policy search with Material-UI components

description: Policy details page with comprehensive information display and claims history
acceptance_criteria: Policy details display all required fields, claims history shows with filtering, page is WCAG compliant
reason: Stub created, needs full implementation of policy details display and claims history

acceptance_criteria: Claims page displays filterable history, supports claim-level policy editing with visual indicators
reason: Stub created, needs full implementation of claims management functionality

description: Payments management page with payment creation, method selection, and reserve allocation
acceptance_criteria: Payments page supports multiple payment methods, displays reserve information, handles payment creation flow
reason: Stub created, needs full implementation of payment management functionality

description: Reusable search component with criteria builder, exact/partial matching, and reset functionality
acceptance_criteria: Search component supports all search criteria, handles exact/partial toggle, resets form correctly

description: Main application component with routing, authentication, and global state management
acceptance_criteria: App routes to correct pages, maintains authentication state, provides global error handling
test_coverage: Application structure reviewed - proper routing and theme setup
